name: Dice Heroes (itch)
description:
Dice Heroes

Dice Heroes is an incremental auto battler where you play as a merchant delving deep into the depths of a dungeon in search of a monstrous Treasure Hoard.

Features

15 minutes of action-packed incremental gameplay!

Pixel Art created by yours truly!

 Hire adventurers to do your fighting!

 Equip them with powerful weapons (Dice)!

 Delve into the dungeon and get treasure!

 Shop for powerful upgrades and new weapons

Plays kind-of okay on your phone browser!

How to Play

 Assign dice to your adventurers

Go into the dungeon and fight monsters for Gold

Spend Gold to make your adventurers stronger

 Try to reach the end and claim the monstrous Treasure Hoard

Pixel Art and Assets

All visual sprites created during the Game Jam

Font is m5x7 by Daniel Linnsen

Audio by Kenny (https://kenney.nl)

Victory Audio by jfkite01 (https://opengameart.org/content/victory-2)

Uses the Apollo palette (https://lospec.com/palette-list/apollo)

Thank You

For checking out my game! This is a submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. The theme was "Roll of the Dice". I was inspired to make an autobattler because of the random nature of them, but I wanted the twist to be "putting your foot on the scales". Overall I'm happy with what I accomplished.

Source code is available at my Github: https://github.com/LaffertyDev/gmtk_2022_dice_heroes

Honest reviews of my game are very appreciated! Please consider leaving a rating at the Game Jam submission page: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1621124
